_header: When Christ was risen from dead to life
Note: For a wholly distinct version see 2588.
Subjects: sermon texts, Gospel; Ascension, feast of
_description: Gospel, ‘In die Ascensionis’, in the Northern Homily Cycle

BodAsh42.First Lines:
When criste was risen fro dede to lyueTo his dissiplis he made him
                    ryue…
BodAsh42.Last Lines:
…Als ȝe may se here be a taleþat oure hertes to him
                    aght to hale
BodAsh42.Editions:
Thompson,  Anne B.,
                        ed.  
             The Northern Homily
                    Cycle.
         Kalamazoo, MI: Western Michigan University for TEAMS, 2008.

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Whon crist was rise from deþ to lyueTo his disciples he made
                    him ryue…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…As ȝe may here sen bi a taleÞat ouȝte vr
                    hertes to him hale
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

BLHar4196.First Lines: …And seþin ffor vs suffer dedBot for þat he oure kind wald take…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …þat may men se here bi a taleþat aght to mak oure hertes hale
BLHar4196.Note: Last 33 lines only; incomplete at beginning due to missing folio between 93 and 94.
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): II.216-217.

MinULZ822.First Lines:
When cryste was ressyn fra dede to lyfeTyll hys folowers he made
                    hym ryfe…
MinULZ822.Last Lines:
…als ȝe may se here be a tale to schewþat aght oure
                    hertes to cryste drawe
MinULZ822.Attributed Title: In die ascencione domini Secundum Marcum (f. 93)

HunHM129.First Lines:
When crist was rysyn fro dede to lyueTo his foloweris he made hym
                    ryue…
HunHM129.Last Lines:
…As ȝe may se here by a taleÞat aght oure hertys to
                    hym hale
